com.sun.pdfview

类 ByteBufferInputStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.InputStream
      • com.sun.pdfview.ByteBufferInputStream
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class ByteBufferInputStream
extends java.io.InputStream
    Exposes a ByteBuffer as an InputStream.
    作者:
    Luke Kirby

      • ByteBufferInputStream

        public ByteBufferInputStream(java.nio.ByteBuffer buffer)
        Class constructor
        参数:
        buffer - the buffer to present as an input stream, positioned at the current read position of the byte buffer
